# PAVER: Pathway Analysis Visualization with Embedding Representations

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

PAVER allows for summary interpretation of perceptible omics outputs, like pathway analyses.

## Installation

You can install the development version of PAVER from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("willgryan/PAVER")
```
